summary: An email from Mark L. Epstein to an unknown recipient (likely law enforcement) reporting unsolicited contact from an individual posing as an FBI agent from Iowa. Epstein attaches photos of the messages and suggests the recipient have someone investigate the individual.

persons.name: Mark L. Epstein
persons.context: Mark L. Epstein sends an email reporting that an individual from Iowa has been calling and texting him, posing as an FBI agent. He attaches photos of the messages and suggests the recipient have someone investigate.

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: Stacey Richman is copied on the email from Mark L. Epstein regarding suspicious contact from an individual posing as an FBI agent.

connections.description: Mark L. Epstein copies Stacey Richman on an email reporting suspicious contact from an individual posing as an FBI agent.

events.title: Unsolicited contact from individual posing as FBI
events.description: An individual from Iowa began calling and texting Mark L. Epstein, posing as an FBI agent.

events.title: Email report of suspicious contact
events.description: Mark L. Epstein sends an email reporting the suspicious contact to an unknown recipient (likely law enforcement) and copies Stacey Richman.

keyFacts: Mark L. Epstein received unsolicited calls and texts from an individual in Iowa posing as an FBI agent in January 2021.
Epstein documented the contact with photos of the messages and forwarded them via email.
The email was sent to an unknown primary recipient (likely a law enforcement contact) and copied to attorney Stacey Richman.
Epstein suggested the recipient have 'one of your buddies out there' investigate the individual posing as FBI.
This correspondence shows ongoing public interest and potential harassment of individuals connected to the Epstein case years after his death.
